con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-SepaFiles-Resend-Pain008
con:testCase.con:description: Tests resend pain008 files via GUI-services. https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2785 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2786

con:config.con:query: UPDATE SEPA_FILE SET SEPA_FILE.STATUS='FAILED_PER' WHERE SEPA_FILE.ID ='${#TestCase#entryID-pain008-Failed}'
